name: WScript or CScript Dropper
description: Detects a file ending in jse, vbe, js, vba, vbs written by cscript.exe or wscript.exe
query: (process.executable:(/.*\\[Ww][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Cc][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND file.path:(/[Cc]\:\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa].*/) AND file.path:(/.*\.[Jj][Ss][Ee]/ OR /.*\.[Vv][Bb][Ee]/ OR /.*\.[Jj][Ss]/ OR /.*\.[Vv][Bb][Aa]/ OR /.*\.[Vv][Bb][Ss]/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:(*\\wscript.exe OR *\\cscript.exe) AND file.path:(C\:\\Users\\* OR C\:\\ProgramData*) AND file.path:(*.jse OR *.vbe OR *.js OR *.vba OR *.vbs))`
